item.title: About Me
item.description: I’m Gayathri, wife of Suresh and mother of Nani Harshavardhan. An engineer by profession and now childbirth educator by passion. Iraivi is the result of my interest to assist pregnant couples in preparing for labor, delivery, and postpartum adjustment with confidence. Iraivi is here to assist with the transition, laying the groundwork for confident childbirth and parenthood.
